spells.name: Animal Purpose Training
spells.description: Animal gains a new general purpose.

spells.name: Heightened Awareness
spells.description: Your recall and ability to process information improve.

spells.name: Invisibility Alarm
spells.description: As alarm, but reacting only to invisible creatures.

spells.name: Refine Improvised Weapon
spells.description: Transform improvised weapon into a masterwork simple or martial weapon.

spells.name: Thorn Javelin
spells.description: Wield a javelin that sickens opponents when it strikes.
